title: Ownership and personal use of laptop/netbook computers 2012 , by country
summary: This statistic shows the Ownership personal use laptop/netbook computers 2012 in .
In 2012 , the Ownership personal use laptop/netbook computers was Italy , accounting laptop/netbook 80 percentage of all population .
gold: This statistic shows the percentage of laptop/netbook computer ownership and usage among the populations of selected countries as of September 2012.
In the U.S. laptop/netbook ownership and usage was found to be at 68 percent of the population .
